text: Oh inu okhulupirira! Musapalane chibwenzi ndi anthu amene amachita chipongwe chipembedzo chanu ndi kuchisandutsa kukhala choseweretsa, amene ali pakati pa anthu amene adapatsidwa mau a Mulungu kale inu musanadze kapena anthu osakhulupirira ndipo opani Mulungu ngati inu ndinu anthu okhulupirira
